metadata.title: CVE-2022-48710 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/radeon: fix a possible null pointer dereference Inradeon_fp_native_mode(), the return value of drm_mode_duplicate() isassigned to mode, which will lead to a NULL pointer dereference on failureof drm_mode_duplicate(). Add a check to avoid npd. The failure status ofdrm_cvt_mode() on the other path is checked too.
